references: S. Janson, On the traveling fly problem, Graph Theory Notes of New York, Vol. XXXI, 17, 1996.
links: S. Janson, On the traveling fly problem
prog: (PARI) a(n) = numerator(prod(i=0, floor((n-1)/2), n-2*i)/prod(i=0, floor((n+2)/2), n+3-2*i)) \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 24 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
